name: lbj20
cooked:
lowRISC is a not-for-profit company that aims to demonstrate, promote and support the use of open-source hardware at the silicon level. We are producing high-quality, security-focused, open, and flexible designs, and delivering on an exciting, high impact open hardware roadmap with industry partners.

Hardware, design, test/verification and hardware/software roles available:
https://lowrisc.applytojob.com/
raw:
[lowRISC](http://lowrisc.org) is a not-for-profit company that aims to demonstrate, promote and support the use of open-source hardware at the silicon level. We are producing high-quality, security-focused, open, and flexible designs, and delivering on an exciting, high impact open hardware roadmap with industry partners. 

Hardware, design, test/verification and hardware/software roles available:
[https://lowrisc.applytojob.com/](https://lowrisc.applytojob.com/)
